title: This music-tech startup uses AI to create original soundtracks, solve music acquisition problems - YourStory
content: This music-tech startup uses AI to create original soundtracks, solve music acquisition problems  YourStory
description: Launched in 2021, Bengaluru-based Beatoven.ai is an AI-powered music tech startup that helps YouTubers, advertising agencies, and wedding film production houses create original soundtracks.
